short_description: The TD_HNSWPredict function takes the InputTable and finds the approximate nearest neighbors for the input data points using the HNSW model generated from TD_HNSW function.
long_description: The TD_HNSWPredict function takes the InputTable and finds the approximate nearest neighbors for the input data points using the HNSW model generated from TD_HNSW function.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The table that contains the input dataset for HNSW model scoring.
input_tables.description: The table that contains the input dataset for HNSW model scoring.

input_tables.name: ModelTable
input_tables.rDescription: The table that contains the HNSW model for scoring.
input_tables.description: The table that contains the HNSW model for scoring.

argument_clauses.name: IdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the column name containing unique identifier of input rows.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the column name containing unique identifier of input rows.

argument_clauses.name: VectorColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the column from the input table to be used for training the HNSW model.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column from the input table to be used for training the HNSW model.

argument_clauses.name: TopK
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify number of top nearest neighbors to generate in the output.
argument_clauses.description: Specify number of top nearest neighbors to generate in the output.

argument_clauses.name: EfSearch
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the number of neighbors to search during search in HNSW model.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the number of neighbors to search during search in HNSW model.

argument_clauses.name: OutputNearestVector
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to output the vector for the nearest neighbor.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to output the vector for the nearest neighbor.

argument_clauses.name: OutputSimilarity
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to output similarity of input datapoint to the nearest vector. If it is set to false, then the function outputs distance instead of similarity.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to output similarity of input datapoint to the nearest vector. If it is set to false, then the function outputs distance instead of similarity.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: SingleInputRow
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether input data contains only a single row.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether input data contains only a single row.
